column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Long awaited JINYA. Finally went some friends on a weekday night and there was still a wait (they don't take reservations)! But it passed quickly enough. We all ordered their special black ramen and it was very tasty and rich. However
column2: with tax and tip and everything it comes out to 17$
column3: which I don't think is worth. Also
column4: the restuarant is waayy too dark in my opinion. I will come back if I have a hankering for ramen and the good packs from the Asian grocery store won't do. Not bad
